messages.message: anyone know how to measure our Python test coverage? I know we have coverage installed, but how do we run it across all our python modules?

I found https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/17595/files and `(export COVERAGE=true; export OPEN_REPORT=true; make run-test-local)` in a particular Python module works! Now if there was a way to get a _single_ coverage report instead of one for each module..
@Heymian @shiqi do you know if anyone has looked into reporting test coverage % in our python/go unit tests jenkins jobs?
Or perhaps testmo has some integration that could help here?
Testmo doesn’t do code coverage. And yup, that’s the command you would run to get coverage in each module.
it works in both python and go code.
